Need an review for this event so here is my review for Dead by Daylight, you can either play as a survivor where you basically hide in a closet until the generators are done by the other schmucks or they have perished and you escape via the hatch. If you choose to play the killer having you just have to play She's a Maniac in the background and it's pretty much a free win.

Dead by Daylight (DbD) macht einfach immer Spaß, am meisten wenn man mit Freunden und Bekannten zusammenspielt. Dafür gibt es auch genug Community's. Die Entwickler bringen in regelmäßigen Abständen neue Killer, Survivor, Maps, Events, sowie Änderungen am Gameplay raus, so dass es auch nicht langweilig wird (Das Spiel ist immerhin schon 3 Jahre alt).
Daher kann ich das Spiel allen, die Spaß an Horror und Erschrecken, geselligen Runden und ein wenig taktischem Gameplay haben, wärmstens empfehlen. ;)
Excelente juego!

Durch das Horror-Erlebnis versucht man sich erst an das Spiel heranzutasten und geniest hier und da einige Jump-Scares, welche es in sich haben. Doch sobald man sich mit dem Spiel abgefunden hat, steigt man ganz schnell in den Kompetitiven Teil des Spiels. Es bietet sehr viel Abwechslung und mach vor allem mit Freunden Spass. Nur empfehlenswert.

Dead by daylight is a torture method that is designed by Behaviour, this game is very bad as you have to be mentally handicapped to get any fun from this game, thankfully spending about 30 minutes in dead by daylight makes you ret*rded, in this game you can visit interesting locations such as Haddonfield and mount Ormond, nothing else. This game will bring you fun experiences and fond memories, you can play as the survivor who need to repair generators to escape, playing survivor is very easy considering this game is very balanced, the only thing to need to watch out for are other random survivors whom have the intellect of a plants vs zombies shooter pea shooter. You can also play the killer who kills the survivors, don't worry, out of over around 30 killers only 3 are viable in casual play. As killer you need to apply pressure to 4 people and 7 generators at the same time, thankfully after 6 years of development this game still feels as if it is in alpha. Its not dead by daylight if the map doesn't have sh*t hitboxs and is full of bugs, this game also contains very fun cosmetics such as dwight christmas canc*r suit where the bells really jingle and a £15 trapper skin. In conclusion this game is utter canc*r and is like £100 with every DLC which you need because all the perks that make a game bare-able are payed for, unless you want to wait 2 years in hopes you get lucky in shrine of secrets.

Decently fun party game that a lot of people take far too seriously. Great way to pass time and enjoy yourself as long as you aren't trying to play too competitively, or if you have friends to play with. It is admittedly riddled with bugs and odd balance decisions, but nothing so extreme that you'd want to quit, as long as you don't view the game competitively. owo
